metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20314 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Stack buffer overflow in libspf2 versions below 1.2.11 when processingcertain SPF macros can lead to Denial of service and potentially codeexecution via malicious crafted SPF explanation messages.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20314` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmail-spf-xs-perl - 1.2.10-7+deb9u2build0.20.04.1
libspf2-2 - 1.2.10-7+deb9u2build0.20.04.1
spfquery - 1.2.10-7+deb9u2build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libspf2 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.10-7+deb9u2build0.20.04.1').
